articleContentList.content:
Camera: Nikon D850 
Lens 1: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 14-24mm F2.8G ED 
Lens 2: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR 
Lens 3: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 70-200mm f/2.8E FL ED VR

Nikon D850 allows photographers to capture fast action in 45.7 megapixels of brilliant resolution. With remarkable advancements across the board—sensor design, autofocus, dynamic range, sensitivity, Speedlight control, battery life, shutter and mirror drive mechanisms, Silent Photography in Live-View mode, focus shift capability and more—this is quite possibly the most impressive, well-rounded DSLR yet.

Weight: 32.3 oz.(915 g) camera body only 
Demensions: 5.8 in. (146 mm) x 4.9 in. (124 mm) x 3.1 in. (78.5 mm) 
Effective Pixels: 45.7 million 
Sensor: 35.9 mm x 23.9 mm CMOS, FX Format 
Storage Media: 1 XQD or CF Express Type-B card, 1 Secure Digital (SD) card 
ISO Sensitivity: ISO 64 – 25,600 
Movie: 4K UHD 3,840×2,160 / 30 fps, 4K UHD 3,840×2,160 / 25 fps, 4K UHD 3,840×2,160 / 24 fps, Full HD 1,920×1,080 / 60 fps, Full HD 1,920×1,080 / 50 fps, Full HD 1,920×1,080 / 30 fps, Full HD 1,920×1,080 / 25 fps, Full HD 1,920×1,080 / 24 fps, HD 1,280×720 / 60 fps, HD 1,280×720 / 50 fps, Slow-motion: Full HD 1,920×1,080 30p (x4), Slow-motion: Full HD 1,920×1,080 25p (x4), Slow-motion: Full HD 1,920×1,080 24p (x5) 
Monitor: 3.2 in. diagonal tilting TFT touch-sensitive LCD 
Battery: EN-EL15a Rechargeable Li-ion Battery

Weight: 35.3 oz. (1,000 g) 
Dimensions: 3.8 in. (98 mm) x 5.2 in. (131.5 mm) 
Focal Length Range: 14 – 24mm 
Maximum Aperture: f/ 2.8 
Format: FX/35mm 
Nano Crystal Coat: Yes 
AF-S (Silent Wave Motor): Yes

With a fast fixed maximum aperture of f/2.8, the award-winning AF-S NIKKOR 14–24mm f/2.8G ED delivers truly superlative performance in any situation. Nikon’s exclusive lens technologies and innovations in optical design deliver outstanding sharpness, color and contrast, even in backlit conditions. Tough, reliable, simply exceptional—this is essential glass for serious photographers who demand the best photos and HD videos.
2. Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR

Weight: 38.4 oz. (1070 g) 
Dimensions: 3.4 in. (88.0 mm) x 6.0 in. (154.5 mm) 
Focal Length Range: 24 – 70mm 
Maximum Aperture: f/ 2.8 
Format: FX/35mm 
Nano Crystal Coat: Yes 
AF-S (Silent Wave Motor): Yes

Super steady and always ready, the AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR workhorse is prepared to take your work to the next level. With up to 4 stops* of VR (Vibration Reduction) image stabilization, you can capture sharp, steady handheld stills and HD videos, and shoot at slower shutter speeds in low-light situations without sacrificing sharpness. Pair it with a Nikon full-frame high-resolution DSLR to capture the decisive moment with a thrilling balance of sharpness and soft blur effects. Covering the sweet spot of the zoom range with a fast f/2.8 constant aperture, you’ll be ready for everything from environmental portraits, studio photography, landscape, architecture (exteriors and interiors), press events and weddings.
3. Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 70-200mm f/2.8E FL ED VR

Weight: 50.5 oz. (1430 g) 
Dimensions: 3.4 in. (88.5 mm) x 7.9 in. (202.5 mm) 
Focal Length Range: 70 – 200mm 
Maximum Aperture: f/ 2.8 
Format: FX/35mm 
Nano Crystal Coat: Yes 
AF-S (Silent Wave Motor): Yes

For years, Nikon’s 70-200 f/2.8 lens has been the benchmark for fast telephoto zoom lenses, unrivaled for low-light, sports, wildlife, concerts, weddings, portraits and everyday shooting. This new version takes that legendary performance to the next level with the same jaw-dropping image quality that has made it a prized lens of pros and serious hobbyists alike. Whether you’re shooting a DX DSLR like the D500 or an FX powerhouse like the D5, the AF-S NIKKOR 70-200mm f/2.8E FL ED VR will take you to thrilling new heights.
DJI – Mavic 2 Zoom with Fly More Kit

Mavic 2 Zoom | 24-48 mm 1 Optical Zoom Camera Powered by a 1/2.3 inch 12-megapixel sensor with up to four-times zoom, including a two-times optical zoom (24mm–48mm), 1 the Mavic 2 Zoom is all about dynamic perspectives. Capture everything from wide angle to mid-range shots for even more creative options. More Expressive Mid-Range Shots Compared to a 24 mm 1 wide angle lens, the 48 mm 1 telephoto lens compresses your perspective, enhancing the parallax effect for a classic cinematic look. Worry-Free and Efficient Shooting When shooting Full HD video, 4 × Lossless Zoom(including 2 × optical zoom) gives you a closer view of far-away subjects, making unique scenes more accessible to capture at a distance – scenes that perhaps are too risky to catch by flying too close. Quick and Accurate Focus Hybrid auto-focus on the Mavic 2 Zoom combines phase and contrast detection for higher focus accuracy with an increased focus speed of up to 40% than before. The auto-focus tracking system makes subjects appear clear and sharp when zooming in and out. Zoom During Flight Dolly Zoom 7 is a new QuickShot for the Mavic 2 Zoom, offering an otherworldly perspective never-before-seen in a fully-integrated drone. Dolly Zoom automatically adjusts focus when flying, adding an intense, warping visual effect to your videos. Set proper focus speed values for even more creative shot options when flying manually. 48-Megapixel Super Resolution Photos When taking a picture in 24 mm equivalent field of view, 1 the camera will capture and patch nine photos with its telephoto lens, resulting in a 48-megapixel super-resolution photo in vivid detail.

Takeoff Weight: 905g 
Demensions(Folded): 214×91×84 mm (length×width×height) 
Demensions(Unfolded): 322×242×84 mm (length×width×height) 
Max Ascent Speed: 5 m/s 
Max Descent Speed: 3 m/s 
Max Speed: 72 kph 
Maximum Takeoff Altitude: 6000 m 
Max Flight Time: 31 minutes 
Max Hovering Time: 29 minutes 
Max Flight Distance: 18 km 
Max Wind Speed Resistance: 29–38 kph 
Max Tilt Angle: 35° 
Max Angular Velocity: 200°/s 
Operating Temperature Range: -10°C to 40°C 
GNSS: GPS+GLONASS 
Internal Storage: 8GB 
Battery Capacity: 3850 mAh

Sensor: 1/2.3″ CMOS, Effective Pixels: 12 million 
Lens: 35 mm Format Equivalent: 24-48 mm 
Aperture: f/2.8 (24 mm)–f/3.8 (48 mm) 
Shooting Range: 0.5 m to ∞ 
ISO Range: 100-3200 
Shutter Speed: 8–1/8000s 
Still Image Size: 4000×3000 
Video Resolution: 4K: 3840×2160 24/25/30p, 2.7K: 2688×1512 24/25/30/48/50/60p, FHD: 1920×1080 24/25/30/48/50/60/120p 
Max Video Bitrate: 100Mbps 
Color Mode: D-Cinelike 
Photo Format: JPEG / DNG (RAW) 
Video Format: MP4 / MOV (MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, HEVC/H.265)

Sensing System: Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing 
Forward: 0.5 – 40 m 
Backward: 0.5 – 32 m 
Upward: 0.1 – 8 m 
Downward: 0.5 – 22 m 
Sides: 0.5 – 10 m

Max Transmission Distance: 10000 m 
Operating Temperature Range: 0℃ – 40℃ 
Battery: 3950 mAh 
Supported Mobile Device Size: Max length: 160 mm; max thickness: 6.5–8.5 mm 
Supported USB Port Types: Lightning, Micro USB (Type-B), USB-C

Video Transmission System: OcuSync 2.0 
Name: DJI GO 4 
Live View Quality: 720p@30fps / 1080p@30fps 
Latency: 120 – 130 ms 
Max Live View Bitrate: 12Mbps
Peak Design – Travel Tripod Carbon Fiber

Weight: 1.29 kg (2.81 lbs) 
Weight Capacity: 9.1 kg (20 lbs) 
Collapsed Demensions: Length: 39.1 cm (15.4”), Diameter: 7.9 cm (3.125″) 
Deployed Demensions: Max height (center column raised): 152.4 cm (60″), Max height (center column down): 130.2 cm (51.25″), Min height (low mode): 14 cm (5.5”)

20lb weight capacity (optimized for a full-frame DSLR + telephoto lens). Stability and vibration damping performance comparable, if not better, than most tripods in its class. Low and inverted modes position your camera inches off the ground. Integrated load hanging hook. Anchor attachment points for carrying with Peak Design straps.

Ultra-smooth, omnidirectional Compact Ball Head. One single adjustment ring. No bulky or confusing knobs. Simple locking ring for total security. Compatible with all PD plates and most 3rd party Arca-type plates. Removable pins allow use with most Arca-type L-brackets.

Spatially efficient design eliminates wasted volume when packed down. Packs down to the diameter of a water bottle. No protruding knobs. Unique design allows quicker, easier setup/takedown. Secure, fast, and ergonomic camera quick release. Fast-locking, low profile leg cams. Legs deploy in seconds, without having to flip over like traditional travel tripod legs.

Pan: Jetboil – Summit Skillet 
Cooker: Keith – Titanium Multi-function Cooker Ti6300 
Cookset: Snow Peak – Multi Compact Cookset Titanium

The nonstick Summit Skillet packs the performance and punch of home cookware into a compact, lightweight, elegant, solution designed for the backpacker set. The ceramic-coated nonstick aluminum construction heats quickly and evenly, expanding the potential of backcountry cooking. Coated with , PFOA-free ceramic nonstick, the skillet releases eggs, pancakes, and other foods easily, making cleanup a breeze. A perfectly angled turner nests into the handle, helping you flip foods without fuss. The skillet pairs perfectly with Jetboil-regulated cooking systems and the Jetboil pot support. Skillet measures 8 by 8.5 by 1.9 inches and weighs 10.6 ounces.

Color: Orange 
Weight: 0.7 lb | 0.38 kg 
Dimensions: 8.5 in x 1.9 in (2160 cm x 4.8 cm) 
Compatible With: HalfGen, SUMO, Genesis, Joule, MicroMo, MightyMo, MiniMo, Flash, Zip, Luna

Eco-friendly, PFOA-free ceramic non-stick. Extra-easy food release and cleanup. Varied wall thickness for even heat distribution. Turner included (nests in handle). Turner weight: .74 oz (21 g). Turner dimensions: 2.6 in x 7.3 in x 0.9 in (65 mm x 185 mm x 21 mm). Pot Support (sold separately) must be used when cooking with the Summit Skillet on all compatible cooking systems except the MightyMo, Stash, Genesis and HalfGen.

Reserved for enthusiasts of beautiful products or for all those who hunt for the tiniest gram. All-titanium multifunction cooker. Only 256 g for 900 ml. Noble and resistant material, healthy without treatment, sanded surface and food grade silicone seal. Biocompatible material, harmless to the human body. This pan is wrapped in a mesh cover.

Dimensions: 6.2 × 4.6 × 4.3 in │ 158 × 118 × 108 mm 
Capacity: 30.4 fl oz │ 900 ml 
Weight: 9 oz │ 256 g

The Cooker has won both 2016/2017 ISPO Winner Award and 2015 Asia Outdoor Industry Silver Award. It can be heated over a flame as well as on a gas or electric cooktop. Hot steam vaporized from the bottom of the outer pot enters inner pot and heats through every piece of the rice evenly, cooking tender, soft rice full of aroma every time in the backcountry. It comes with a custom made mesh storage sack. The inner pot, outer pot, lid and handles are made of premium pure titanium grade 1; The lock spring is made of 304 stainless steel; The sealing ring is made of food grade silicone.Titanium is ultralight and super strong; it is also eco-friendly and exceptionally corrosion-resistant.
Snow Peak – Multi Compact Cookset Titanium

Crafted from Japanese titanium, Snow Peak’s Multi Compact Cookset is a lightweight set of pots for the backcountry. Designed for two users, the Multi Compact Cookset includes two stacking pots and frypans with foldable handles. Pair the Multi Compact Cookset Titanium with the LiteMax Titanium Stove for a backcountry setup.

Weight: 11.6 oz (330 g) 
Size: Pot 1: D 5.9″ H 2.9″, Pot 2: D 5″ H 2.75″, Pan 1: D 6″ H 1.25″, Pan 2: 5.25″ H 1.25″ 
Capacity: Pot 1: 33.8 fl oz, Pot 2: 26.3 fl oz

Dagger OSMO is the quintessential one-tent-wonder: lightweight enough for backpacking, yet roomy enough for comfort on any adventure. Dagger OSMO is one of the first tents in Nemo’s iconic backpacking collection to feature our new proprietary OSMO™ fabric with advanced water repellency that lasts 4x longer and keeps you drier from start to finish. This composite fabric has 3x less stretch when wet, reducing sag and maintaining wind and rain shedding in any weather. OSMO fabrics are completely PFC- and PFAS-free, meet fire retardancy standards without the use of added chemicals, and are woven from 100% recycled yarns. With additional design features for convenience and durability, Dagger OSMO sets the standard for a balance of performance and thoughtful design.

Capacity: 2 Person 
Season: 3 
Minimum Weight: 3 lb , 6 oz / 1.52 kg 
Packed Weight: 4 lb , 2 oz / 1.86 kg 
Peak Height: 42 in / 106 cm 
Floor Area: 31.3 sq ft / 2.9 sq m 
Floor Dimensions: 90 x 50 in / 229 x 127 cm 
Vestibule Area: 11.4 sq ft + 11.4 sq ft / 1.1 sq m + 1.1 sq m

Door Quantity: 2 
Vestibule Quantity: 2 
Canopy Fabric: Nylon Ripstop/ No-See-Um Mesh 
Fly Fabric: OSMO 
Floor Fabric: 0D OSMO Ripstop (2000 mm) 
Rainfly Fabric: 0D OSMO Ripstop (2000 mm) 
Color: Birch Bud/Goodnight Gray 
Stuff Sack: Divvy Cube

Carrying forward the legacy features of its best-selling predecessor, Dagger OSMO includes a color-coded, DAC Featherlite NSL hubbed pole structure for generous interior volume and a fast, intuitive setup. With two doors and two expansive trapezoidal vestibules, Dagger OSMO leads its category for storage area and volume.

Nemo also added some new features such as: the Divvy Cube™ rectangular stuff sack which packs better and allows you to split the load with a partner; the Landing Zone™ tub for protected storage under the vestibule; and our Gatekeeper™ door clips which make holding the doors back a cinch. Other thoughtful features include our overhead Nightlight Pocket™ headlamp diffuser for a comfortable glow at night, gear pockets for storage of personal items, and a 100% recycled Repreve™ pole bag that protects the poles and takes the place of unnecessary poly bags. When your adventures require one tent to rule them all, Dagger OSMO delivers increased performance and versatility — and reduced impact on the planet.

Sleeping Bag: Nemo - Riff Down Sleeping Bag 
Sleeping Pad: Nemo - Tensor Alpine Ultralight Mountaineering Pad 
Pillow: Nemo - Fillo Elite Luxury Backpacking Pillow
Nemo – Riff 30 Down Sleeping Bag – Long Wide

Riff is NEMO’s top-of-the-line, backcountry-oriented Ultralight Spoon™ shape sleeping bag. This pinnacle performance 3-season 800 FP down bag offers a more athletic cut, designed for side sleepers who prefer space-saving packability and shaving critical ounces for long hours on the trail. Seventy percent of people sleep on their side, yet mummy bags are not designed to accommodate this. NEMO’s unique Spoon shape bags offer more room at the elbows and knees, allowing side sleepers to shift positions comfortably throughout the night.

Minimum Weight: 2 lb , 0 oz / 915 g 
Packed Size: 11.5 x 7.5 in dia / 29 x 19 cm dia 
Temp Rating: 30F / -1C 
ISO Comfort: 40F / 4C 
Fill Type: 800 FP Down 
Fill Weight: 0 lb , 10 oz / 290 g 
Fits Up To: 6’6″ / 198 cm 
Shoulder Girth: 64 in / 163 cm 
Hip Girth: 55 in / 140 cm 
Knee Girth: 61 in / 155 cm 
Compressed Volume: 5 L 
Shell Fabric: Nylon 
Footbox Fabric: Nylon 
Lining Fabric: Nylon 
Zipper Location: Left 
Stuff Sack: Compression stuff sack

This popular bag is loaded with features, including Thermo Gill™ vents that help regulate temperature during the night, a Blanket Fold™ draft collar that provides tucked-in comfort, and a waterproof/breathable footbox to withstand tent condensation. Left-sided zippers on the men’s and right-sided zippers on the women’s bags allow two Riffs to zip together for a double bag.
Nemo – Tensor Alpine Ultralight Mountaineering Pad – Long Wide

This pinnacle mountaineering pad offers lightweight, compact, extreme warmth without sacrificing comfort. Three layers of suspended metalized film and a unique construction efficiently retains your own body heat. Tensor Alpine brings warmth and comfort to cold weather camping. Whether at base camp or high on the mountain before a summit push, the combination of compact size, light weight, and warmth cannot be beat.

Minimum Weight: 1 lb , 8 oz / 690 g 
Packed Weight: 1 lb , 11 oz / 770 g 
Packed Size: 9.5 x 3.5 in dia / 24 x 9 cm dia 
R-Value: 4.8 
Thickness: 3.0 in 
Shape: Rectangular 
Color: Mountaineering Orange 
Insulation: Aluminized Film 
Fabric: PU Polyester

A zero-profile, multifunctional, micro-adjustable valve offers convenient inflation and fast deflation. The included Vortex™ pump sack provides fast and easy inflation without introducing moisture into your pad. Patent-pending Spaceframe™ baffles are low-stretch trusses that provide greater stability and point deflection resistance than competitors. Tensor Alpine’s unique construction sleeps quieter than other pads.
Nemo – Fillo Elite Luxury Backpacking Pillow

This wider, ultralight version of our award-winning camping & backpacking pillow brings clever design to an often-overlooked piece of gear: the humble pillow. Fillo Elite Luxury takes all the innovation of our classic Fillo and transforms it into an equally comfortable accessory that’s a fraction of the weight and packed size.

Minimum Weight: 0 lb , 4.0 oz / 112 g 
Packed Weight: 5.0 x 3.0 in dia / 13 x 7 cm dia 
Fill Type: PrimaLoft® 
Thickness: 3.0 in 
Dimensions: 21 x 11 x 3.0 in / 53 x 29 x 8 cm 
Color: Midnight Grey 
Stuff Sack: Internal stuff sack

The interior features our baffled air cell structure to help it retain shape but is covered with a cozy layer of 100% post-consumer recycled Primaloft® insulation. An ultra-soft, machine-washable jersey cover is the final touch for a pillow that comfortably cradles your head with a width to accommodate broad-shouldered users, and pack size small enough for backpacking trips. Armed with an unobtrusive, ergonomic valve and integrated stuff sack, Fillo Elite is quick to inflate and deflate, and stows away at a size not much bigger than a lime, making it a worthy addition to your pack. (Plus: It’s equally dreamy for flights, long roadtrips, or providing lumbar support at home.)

Chair: Nemo - Moonlite Reclining Camp Chair 
Table: Nemo - Moonlander Dual-Height Table

Take Moonlite into the backcountry and experience the feeling of weightlessness as you lean back under the stars. Easy to set up and barely noticeable in your pack, Moonlite is your go-to chair for every adventure, from a picnic in the park to an extended backpacking adventure. Oversized tubes, paired with forged aluminum hubs, create exceptional strength and stability. And best of all, Moonlite is the only chair of its kind with an adjustable seating position, making it ideal for dining or reclining.

Packed Size: 4.0 x 4.0 x 14.0 in / 10 x 10 x 35 cm 
Dimensions: 20 x 20 x 26 in / 52 x 51 x 65 cm 
Color: Bluebird 
Frame: Aluminum 
Weight: 1 lb , 14 oz / 850 g 
Weight Capacity: 300 lb 
Stuff Sack Style: Zippered storage bag

The exceptional comfort of the Moonlite chair comes from a custom-engineered, asymmetrical mesh that stretches to accommodate and support a variety of body types without needing seams. This unique seamless seat attaches to the frame with Y-molded ball-and-socket connectors that rotate and align with your body to avoid uncomfortable pressure points. The adjustable seating position paired with quality construction make for a transformative sitting experience in a packed weight and size that fits any adventure. True to our mission of sustainability, Moonlite uses 100% post-consumer recycled materials for the webbing and mesh, while the reclining hardware and seat mesh are bluesign® approved.

No matter where you’re headed, Moonlander is the best new addition to your camp kit. With a dual-height, convertible design, Moonlander can provide a secure landing for a pair of wine glasses on a picnic blanket, or the perfectly elevated side table for your Stargaze™ and Moonlite™ recliners. The setup is a charm — like opening a pop-up book — and it packs small enough to fit in the laptop sleeve of a backpack.

Packed Size: 14.5 x 9.5 x 1.5 in / 37.3 x 23.9 x 3.4 cm 
Dimensions: 19 x 15 x 16 in / 48 x 37 x 40 cm 
Color: Boreal 
Frame: Aluminum 
Weight: 4 lb , 14 oz / 2.2 kg 
Weight Capacity: 100 lb 
Stuff Sack Style: Mountaineering Orange 
Insulation: Padded Carying Caseg

Moonlander’s sleek design and high-quality hardware exceed expectations on every level, from durability to aesthetics. Custom-engineered aluminum hinges are molded into the table for the ultimate in security and longevity — always aligned, without the need to be tightened for smooth functionality. Rugged aluminum poles with zinc pole tips twist-lock into place to elevate to side table height. When not in use, legs lock into a storage area on the underside of the table for a tidy pack up. A smooth, impervious tabletop surface is heat-resistant and cleans easily. Moonlander comes with a sharply designed, padded case or fits perfectly in your pack’s laptop sleeve.

Approach Shoe: Arc’teryx – Konseal FL 2 Leather GTX Shoe 
Approach Shoe: Arc’teryx – Konseal FL GTX Shoe 
Hiking Boot: Timberland – White Ledge Mid Waterproof Hiking Boot
Arc’teryx – Konseal FL 2 Leather GTX Shoe

Shifting conditions, mixed terrain, fully loaded pack – on technical approaches you need confidence and comfort. The light, fast Konseal FL 2 is nimble, supportive, and made to handle varied conditions and demanding trails. GORE-TEX provides proven waterproof, breathable protection, and the leather upper adds durability. Its Vibram® Megagrip outsole provides a secure hold – wet or dry – and the TPU midfoot chassis and raised perimeter sidewalls provide stability on shifting surfaces.

Activity: Hiking / Trekking / Rock Climbing / Alpine Climbing 
Materials: GORE-TEX membrane, Vibram® Megagrip™, TPU high abrasion protection, Split-Suede Leather

The Konseal FL GTX Shoe from Arc’teryx will keep your feet dry on the approach to your favourite crag! The approach shoes boast a lightweight, extremely tough synthetic upper with a waterproof GORE-TEX membrane. The EVA midsole and the Ortholite footbed provide shock absorption and take the strain off your joints. The laces extend down far down and can be adjusted for an individualised fit. The Vibram Megagrip outsole is designed specifically for changing terrain and comes equipped with a climbing zone at the toe. The abrasion-resistant toe cap will prevent wear and tear.

Activity: Rock Climbing / Alpine Climbing 
Materials: GORE-TEX membrane, Vibram® Megagrip™, 3D molded rubber toe cap, 4mm thickness OrthoLite™ 3D molded insert, Injected EVA, 60 Shore C – midsole
Timberland – White Ledge Mid Waterproof Hiking Boot

Looking good at any elevation: The White Ledge men’s hikers are some of our all-time best-sellers. With outdoor-inspired styling and complete protection from rain and water crossings, these waterproof hiking boots can’t wait to get you to the summit.

Premium full-grain waterproof leather uppers for comfort and durability, Seam-sealed waterproof construction keeps feet dry in any weather, Rustproof, speed lace hardware with hooks at top for secure lacing, ReBOTL™ recycled fabric linings, EVA footbeds and midsoles, Solid rubber outsoles with multi-directional lugs for traction on varied terrain.

Shell Jacket: Arc’teryx – Beta SV Jacket 
Shell Jacket: Arc’teryx – Gamma MX Hoody 
Insulated Jacket: Arc’teryx – Atom LT Hoody 
Insulated Jacket: Arc’teryx – Cerium LT Hoody

Alpine terrain is beautiful, unpredictable and unforgiving. The versatile Beta SV is designed for this world. Made from hardwearing GORE-TEX PRO with Most Rugged Technology – the most durable available – its waterproof, breathable protection withstands the realities of harsh mountain environments. The articulated fit moves with you, pit zips speed ventilation, and the StormHood™ provides full coverage without impeding lines-of-sight, and an embedded RECCO® reflector improves searchability in emergency situations.

Material: N80d Most Rugged 3L GORE-TEX PRO – bluesign Approved Material 
Fabric Treatment: DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture 
Snowsport Features: RECCO® reflector hidden in hood brim

Alpine environments are dynamic. You need a softshell that works across the spectrum of changing outputs and shifting conditions. Delivering light weather protection, breathable warmth, and exceptional freedom of movement, the Gamma MX Hoody is the solution. The wind and water resistant Fortius™ 2.0 fabric is refined for superior warmth-to-weight and durability, and a front liner improves core warmth. The Stormhood™ is helmet compatible and protects without impeding peripheral vision.

Material: Fortius 2.0™—49% polyester, 35% nylon, 16% elastane 
Fabric Treatment: DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture

Alpine proven as a midlayer and standalone, this versatile hoody has warmed climbers and backcountry travelers for years. Built to handle a range of conditions and output levels, the latest-generation Atom LT’s Coreloft™ Compact insulation retains its warmth even if wet and has loft retention to withstand years of packing and unpacking. The water resistant Tyono™ 20 face fabric is breathable and durable, stretch side panels improve fit and freedom, and the insulated StormHood™ adds warmth.

Material: Lining: Dope Permeair™ 20D – 100% nylon – Dope Dyed, bluesign Approved Material (select colours), Insulation: Coreloft™ 60 (60 g/m²) – 100% Recycled Polyester – bluesign Approved Material, Self: Tyono™ 20 denier shell with FC0 DWR treatment – 100% nylon, Stretch fleece – 94% polyester, 6% elastane. 
Fabric Treatment: DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture

Streamlined in its design, and with an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio, the Cerium LT hoody works as a mid layer or a standalone piece in cool, dry conditions. Premium 850 fill-power down is lofty and resilient, the Arato™ 10 nylon shell provides lightweight durability, and Down Composite Mapping™ strategically places Coreloft™ synthetic insulation in moisture-prone areas. Articulated construction moves with the body, and the insulated StormHood™ provides coverage without compromising range of vision.

Material: Insulation: Coreloft™ 80 (80gsm) and 100 (100gsm) – 100% Polyester – bluesign Approved Material, Insulation: 850 fill European white goose down – RDS down, Arato™ 10 – 100% nylon. 
Fabric Treatment: DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture

Lantern: Goalzero – Lighthouse Micro Flash USB Rechargeable Lantern 
Lantern: Ledlenser – ML4 
Lantern: ML6 
Lantern: Biolite – AlpenGlow 250 & 500 Multicolor USB Lantern
Goalzero – Lighthouse Micro Flash USB Rechargeable Lantern
Weatherproof IPX6 design, 120 dimmable Lumens, USB rechargeable – this tiny flashlight is the perfect companion for the weight-conscious adventurer.

Weight: 2.4 oz 
Dimensions: 3.66 x 1.5 in (93 x 37.75 cm) 
Full Bright, 4 Lights (Average): 135 Lumens, 3800K 
Dimmest, 2 Lights (Average): 7 Lumens, 3800K 
Flashlight, Bright (Average): 115 Lumens, 3000K 
Flashlight, Dim (Average): 15 Lumens, 3000K 
Flashlight Runtime: 100 hours (low), 8.5 hours (high) 
One Side Lit Runtime: 170 hours (low), 15 hours (high) 
Both Sides lit Runtime: 80 hours (low), 7 hours (high)

USB rechargeable lantern with built-in 120 lumen flashlight. Easy-to-read battery indicator with IPX6 weatherproof rating. Weighs only 2.4oz with runtime of 7-170 hours depending on brightness setting. Recharge the Lighthouse Micro Flash from the sun by connecting a compatible solar panel in about 3.5 hours. The Lighthouse Micro Flash can be recharged from a USB Source in about 3.5 hours.

The ultra-compact outdoor light by Ledlenser with state of the art lens technology for glare-free light and high energy efficiency. Dual Power technology offers extended usage time thanks to AA batteries to back up the included rechargeable battery. This battery can be charged via magnetic charge system, which makes it particularly easy to attach the charging cable. Moreover the latern has a Carabiner snap hook for flexible usage and fastening.

Weight: 71g 
Tightness: IP66 
Head diameter: 35mm 
Luminosity (Boost): 300 Lumens 
Luminosity (Power): 150 Lumens 
Luminosity (Mid Power): 50 Lumens 
Luminosity (Low Power): 5 Lumens 
Operation time (Power): 3 hours 
Operation time (Mid Power): 8 hours 
Operation time (Low Power): 45 hours

The ultra-compact outdoor light by Ledlenser with state of the art lens technology for glare-free light and high energy efficiency. Dual Power technology offers extended usage time thanks to AA batteries to back up the included rechargeable battery. The rechargeable battery can be charged via magnetic charge system, which makes it particularly easy to attach the charging cable. Carabiner snap hook for flexible usage and fastening. Optional red light for enhanced maintenance of night vision.

No matter how far away from civilization you are, the ML6 has you covered. State-of-the-art lens technology ensures optimal light distribution with maximum energy efficiency. Glare-free illumination of your surroundings makes it easy to pick the perfect spot for the light. Its hook, removable stand and magnet mean that all possibilities are covered. The ML6 can also be used as a power bank to recharge other electronic devices. Now there’s nothing to stop you from creating a warm and pleasant atmosphere, wherever you are.

Weight: 280g 
Tightness: IP54 
Head diameter: 42mm 
Luminosity (Boost): 750 Lumens 
Luminosity (Power): 550 Lumens

Operation time (Power): 4 hours

The camping light from Ledlenser with state-of-the-art lens technology for glare-free light and high efficiency. With three switches for intuitive and easy operation, a built-in battery indicator, and lighting that can be smoothly dimmed and brightened. Power bank with USB connection for recharging electronic devices like cell phones, etc. Fluorescent elements to make it easier to find the light in the dark. Rubber hook for hanging the light, integrated magnet for mounting it on metal surfaces, and a removable stand with an extra built-in metal hook that can be flipped out to provide more light mounting options.

The AlpenGlow 250 rechargeable lantern delivers ambient and task-based lighting, all inspired by nature. Featuring high-efficiency ChromaReal LED technology, accurately render the colors in your environment with the glow of warm natural light. Shake the lantern and the internal accelerometer unlocks additional features like Candle Flicker or a mesmerizing rotation of color. Small size makes it easy to pack and ready for the backyard or the backcountry. The AlpenGlow 500 rechargeable lantern delivers a dusk or daylight feel inspired by nature. Featuring high-efficiency ChromaReal LED technology, accurately render the colors in your environment with the glow of warm natural light. Feeling more aurora borealis? Shake the lantern for an instant rotation of mesmerizing color. Offering both ambient and task-based light, AlpenGlow 500 is ready for the backyard or the backcountry.
